channel.title: Overview on Crunchy Data Container Suite Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on Crunchy Data Container Suite Documentation

item.title: Container Images
item.description: Overview The following provides a high level overview of each of the container images. CentOS vs RHEL Images The Crunchy Container suite provides two different OS images: centos7 and rhel7. These images are indentical except for the packages used by yum to install the software. The centos7 images, yum is configured to use PostgreSQL RPM Building Project. The rhel7 images use Crunchy Certified RPMs and are only available to active Crunchy Data customers.

item.title: Supported Platforms
item.description: Supported Platforms Crunchy Container Suite supports the following platforms: Docker 1.13+ Kubernetes 1.12+ OpenShift Container Platform 3.11 VMWare Enterprise PKS 1.3+
